items.title: hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-

items.content:

items.title: First Store in West Japan! hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda Opening Soon!
items.author: narita
items.content:
Scheduled to Open on June 27th, 2025!

hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda will be the first store to open in western Japan, and the second store nationwide, and will feature new items using exclusive visuals drawn by illustrators 三九呂 and むぎた.

The first part of this series will feature five talents, with future releases scheduled. Apart from a selection of official hololive production merchandise, exclusive content will also be available.

The hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda offers an abundance of attractive content, so don’t miss this chance to visit us.

Shop Name： hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda Location：Osaka 1-1-3 Shibata, Kita-ku, Osaka 530-0012　HANKYU SANBAN GAI Kita-kan B1F

Dates： Friday, June 27th, 2025 to Spring 2026

Operating hours： 10AM – 9PM* Same as the operating hours for HANKYU SANBAN GAI.

As we expect a surge of visitors , we will limit entries using LivePocket-Ticket-. Please register from the application pages below.

Dates of restricted entries

Additionally, we will be restricting entry and handing out numbered tickets should there be a high number of customers aside from the aforementioned dates.

Store-original merchandise will be available in advance. * There may be purchase limitations due to limited stock.

* We will try to ensure there are sufficient stocks, but please understand that they may still sell out.

* We cannot answer inventory-related inquiries (available quantities, restock dates, etc.).

* We will be selling merchandise from this store post this event.

* Images are for illustrative purposes only. Actual products may differ.

Featured Talents for Part One Shirakami Fubuki / Nakiri Ayame / Houshou Marine / Shishiro Botan / Kikirara Vivi

・ New arrivals of store-original merchandise

・ A selection of merchandise from the hololive production OFFICIAL SHOP *

・ A selection of licensed merchandise from hololive production* The lineup will not include talent anniversary or made-to-order merchandise. Once sold out, some merchandise may no longer be available.

Novelties will differ depending on the period and amount purchased. We will gift novelties on a first-come, first-served basis when you purchase over a certain amount in-store.* Randomized novelties will not be able to be chosen and will only be available while stocks last.Novelty giveaway period： From Sunday, June 27th, 2025, while stocks last. ・ Every 3,300 yen (tax incl.) spent in a single purchase will entitle customers to one hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda original Vol.1 Uchiwa (handheld fan) (5 Designs/Randomized)

・ Single purchases over 11,000 yen (tax incl.) will entitle customers to one hololive production official shop in Osaka Umeda original bag (1 type)

In addition, any customers who show staff that they have registered for an account on the holoplus app will receive an additional novelty. Download holoplus* All novelties are available while stocks last.

We will continue to provide more exciting content for everyone who visits us at the HANKYU SANBAN GAI, so be sure to stay updated for the latest news.

① Life-sized illustrated panels of the talents as shop staff displayed outside the store For a limited time, life-sized panels of talents as shop staff will be displayed in HANKYU SANBAN GAI.

When： Friday, June 27th – Friday, July 25th, 2025

(Illustrated by 三九呂)

② Mini-character illustration of talents as shop staff displayed by the escalator in front of the store Mini-character illustration of talents as a shop staff will appear in the open area inside HANKYU SANBAN GAI.

③ In-store special announcements Apart from original in-store announcements by the five featured talents, you will also get to hear announcements from hololive production’s official anchorwoman, Harusaki Nodoka.

④ A message from the talents The store will feature autographs and messages written by the featured talents.
